title: Bogyiszló Orchestra
text:
The Bogyiszló Orchestra is a Hungarian folk orchestra that plays dance music, and was associated with the  Busójárás carnival in Mohács.


== References ==
Broughton, Simon (2000). "A Musical Mother Tongue". In Broughton, Simon; Ellingham, Mark (eds.). World Music, Vol. 1: Africa, Europe and the Middle East. London: Rough Guides. pp. 159–167. ISBN 1-85828-636-0.
